response.original_title: 噂の海パン刑事登場/部長よ! あれがパリの灯だ/激突! 神VS両津
response.overview: Kankichi Ryotsu, also known as Ryo-san, works at the Kameari Koen-mae Police Station in the Katsushika district and is an unconventional police officer who likes to make money. Together with their colleagues, the super celebrity Nakagawa, the super beautiful Reiko, their straight-laced boss, director Ohara and other super unique faces, they are also going to create a huge mess today!
response.title: KochiKame TV Special 01 - The Rumoured Detective Speedo Appears / The Hyper Elementary Student VS. Ryotsu / Chief! A Light from Paris / Bam! God vs. Ryotsu
